attributes.action: Increase SSP for people in isolation or quarantine due to Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details:
Review a more liveable amount. 

Things that should be taken into account:
•Rent/Mortgage payments 
• Electric bills
• Water bills
• Gas bills
• Council Tax 
• Phone and Internet bills 
• Tv license 
• Food
• medication 

All essential things that will still need to be paid. It’s is impossible to do so with £94.25 per a week.
attributes.background:
Statutory Sick Pay should be more the £94.25 while the country is being effected by Coronavirus.

If given no choice but to isolate or quarantine the last thing you want is to be worried about paying rent.
